content: worsted weight yarn us size i / 5 5 mm crochet hook gauge 25 stitches in 6 15 2 cm 30 row in 6 15 2 cm for #5 bulky weight 58 72 83 112 129 144 158 184 197 210 yards of #5 bulky weight yarn us size k / 6 5 mm crochet hook gauge 12 stitches in 4 10 cm 15 row in 4 10 cm for #6 super bulky weight 39 49 56 75 87 97 106 124 133 142 yards of #6 super bulky weight yarn us size m / 8 0 mm crochet hook gauge 12 stitches in 5 12 7 cm 11 row in 4 10 cm **you will also need ** scissors measuring tape yarn needle or blunt tapestry needle if adding a pom pom or tag your needle should be able to fit through the holes in the button or tag faux fur pom pom optional button for attaching pom pom optional leather or faux leather tag optional if using super bulky yarn you ll also need some embroidery floss for sewing on the button and / or tag optional **this pattern is intended for your personal use only you may not share it copy it sell it give it away or mass-produce the finished product however you may sell the finished items on a small scale as long as you convey in your item description that you used a yay for yarn pattern yay for yarn copyright© 2020 current all patterns and photos are owned by yay for yarn ** 1 https //yayforyarn com/easiest-crochet-hat/ 2 https //shop yayforyarn com/products/easiest-crochet-hat-ever-pdf-crochet-pattern-video-tutorial-for-beginners
